snippet: Now an assistant with the Chinese women’s basketball team, the American Bo Overton’s coaching resume includes double-digit stops in three countries.
abstract: Profile of American Bo Overton whose coaching resume includes double-digit stops in three countries; he is at the Olympics as an assistant with the Chinese women's basketball team
lead_paragraph: Now an assistant with the Chinese women’s basketball team, the American Bo Overton’s coaching resume includes double-digit stops in three countries.

headline.seo: Olympics Is Latest Stop for Globetrotting Overton
headline.main: In Basketball, a Different and More Literal Globetrotter
headline.print_headline: In Basketball, a Different and More Literal Globetrotter
